```{r, fig.width=5, fig.height=4}
#| echo: true
#| fig-align: center
#| code-fold: true 
#| code-summary: "Show R code"

set.seed(42)
n.samples <- 10000
xbars <- numeric(n.samples)

for (i in 1:n.samples) {
    xbars[i] <- mean(rpois(100, lambda = 5))
}

df <- data.frame(xbar = xbars)

ggplot(data = df, aes(xbar)) +
    geom_histogram(fill = custom_colors["yellow"], color = custom_colors["black"]) +
    custom_theme() +
    labs(x = expression(bar(x)), title = "distribution of sample means drawn\nfrom a Poisson distribution")

```
